simplifiedChinese.title: Life and Death Issues
simplifiedChinese.Question1: Meditate on the acts of God described in this portion of Scripture.
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What do these clarify about the heart of God?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: Have you experienced this expression of the heart of God in your life? If yes, how so? If not, what steps can you take to experience this?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What can you do to grow in your desire to know and obey God more intimately in your life?
